headline.main: NAVY IDENTIFIES THE 'BATTLESHIP X'; South Dakota, of New Slugger Type, Got 32 Japanese Planes, Sank Three Cruisers

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 2 (AP) -- The famous "Battleship X," which shot down thirty-two planes in one engagement and in another sank three Japanese cruisers, was identified today by the Navy as the South Dakota.
abstract: unidentified US battleship which downed 32 planes in 1 action and sank 3 Jap cruisers in another revealed to have been USS South Dakota; Rear Adm Gatch describes role in Santa Cruz battle, Oct '42; role in Savo Is battle, Nov '42, noted; illus
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 2 (AP) -- The famous "Battleship X," which shot down thirty-two planes in one engagement and in another sank three Japanese cruisers, was identified today by the Navy as the South Dakota....
